ability: 【A】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your Deck. If that card is a 《風南島》 Character, add it to Hand, choose 1 card from your Hand, place it into Waiting Room. (If not, return revealed card to its original position)

name: 小川で遊ぼう！
flavor_text: 依愛「魔界の炎を思い出すのだ」
ability: Draw up to 2 cards, choose 2 cards from your Hand, place them at the top of the Deck.

name: ホラーは苦手
ability: ● Choose 1 Character in battle, during this turn, it gains the following ability.『【C】 This card cannot deal Damage to Players.』

name: 無防備な姿 ひまり
flavor_text: あっ、わたし、今、格好――
ability: 【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, place the top card of your Deck into Waiting Room. If that card is a 《風南島》 Character, during this turn, this card gets +1 Soul.

name: ホログラムの天
flavor_text: 最初にお話ししましたとおり、私は少女型人工知能・天なんです
ability: 【A】 When a Climax is placed into your Climax Slot, during this turn, this card gets ＋Ｘ Power. Ｘ is equal to the number of your 《風南島》 Character ×500.
